mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAPER_INFO ( NOTICE_NO, PAPER_KOR, PAPER_ENG, USER_NO, FILE_ORG_NAME, FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH, PAPER_AD, REG_USER_NO, REG_DT ) VALUES ( CONVERT(#{notice_no}, UNSIGNED), #{paper_kor}, #{paper_eng}, #{user_no}, #{file_org_name}, #{file_name}, #{file_path}, #{paper_ad}, #{user_no}, NOW() )

INSERT INTO WRITER_INFO ( NOTICE_NO, PAPER_NO, WRITER_NAME, WRITER_EMAIL, WRITER_BELONG, REG_USER_NO, REG_DT ) VALUES
( #{item.notice_no}, (SELECT PAPER_NO FROM PAPER_INFO WHERE USER_NO = #{item.reg_user_no} ORDER BY REG_DT DESC LIMIT 1), #{item.writer_name}, #{item.writer_email}, #{item.writer_belong}, #{item.reg_user_no}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT P.NOTICE_NO, P.PAPER_NO, P.PAPER_KOR, P.PAPER_ENG, U.USER_NAME, C.CODE_CONTENTS, P.FILE_NAME, P.FILE_PATH, FORMAT(P.REG_DT,'%Y%m%d') AS REG_DT FROM PAPER_INFO P, USER_INFO U, CODE_INFO C WHERE P.USER_NO = U.USER_NO AND P.PAPER_AD = C.CODE_NO AND P.NOTICE_NO = #{notice_no}
